definitions.definition: A device that charges or recharges .
examples: Put the batteries in the charger overnight so we can use them tomorrow.

definitions.definition: A large horse trained for battle and used by the cavalry ( of a lighter build than a destrier ) .
examples: The knight rode a white charger .

definitions.definition: A large decorative plate, sometimes used under dinner plates or other savoury-dish vessels in a multi-course meal; also service plate or underplate .
examples: The fancy restaurant used a white porcelain charger when serving.

definitions.definition: A speed loader that holds several cartridges together in a single unit for easier loading of a firearm 's magazine .
A rectal concealment container for prohibited material such as money, drugs and tools.
Synonym of hard charger ( “ person with a good work ethic ” ) .

main_definition: A device that charges or recharges .
secondary_definitions: ( historical , military ) A large horse trained for battle and used by the cavalry ( of a lighter build than a destrier ) .
A large decorative plate, sometimes used under dinner plates or other savoury-dish vessels in a multi-course meal; also service plate or underplate .
( firearms ) A speed loader that holds several cartridges together in a single unit for easier loading of a firearm 's magazine .
( prison ) A rectal concealment container for prohibited material such as money, drugs and tools.
Synonym of hard charger ( “ person with a good work ethic ” ) .
